hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.warrant.report.WarrantSummary( warrant.id, warrant.date, warrant.warrantReason, (select warrantArrest.id from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantArrest warrantArrest where warrantArrest.warrant = warrant) ) from omis.warrant.domain.Warrant warrant where warrant.offender = :offender and warrant not in (select warrant from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantRelease warrantRelease inner join warrantRelease.warrant warrant2 where warrant2 = warrant) and warrant not in (select warrant from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantCancellation warrantCancellation inner join warrantCancellation.warrant warrant2 where warrant2 = warrant) order by warrant.date desc

select new omis.warrant.report.WarrantSummary( warrant.id, warrant.date, warrant.warrantReason, clearedByPersonName.lastName, clearedByPersonName.firstName, warrantRelease.clearSignature.date, warrantRelease.id, cast(null as long), (select warrantArrest.id from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantArrest warrantArrest where warrantArrest.warrant = warrant) ) from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantRelease warrantRelease inner join warrantRelease.warrant warrant inner join warrantRelease.clearSignature.person person inner join person.name clearedByPersonName where warrant.offender = :offender

select new omis.warrant.report.WarrantSummary( warrant.id, warrant.date, warrant.warrantReason, clearedByPersonName.lastName, clearedByPersonName.firstName, warrantCancellation.clearSignature.date, cast(null as long), warrantCancellation.id, (select warrantArrest.id from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantArrest warrantArrest where warrantArrest.warrant = warrant) ) from omis.warrant.domain.WarrantCancellation warrantCancellation inner join warrantCancellation.warrant warrant inner join warrantCancellation.clearSignature.person person inner join person.name clearedByPersonName where warrant.offender = :offender
select count(warrant.id) from omis.warrant.domain.Warrant warrant where warrant.offender = :offender
